text:
Any external entity (such as a DTD) without a public identity will
cause a null pointer exception to be thrown in resolveEntity in 
org/apache/batik/dom/svg/SAXSVGDocumentFactory.java line 252.

The current line will raise a null pointer exception when publicId == null
(which is the appropriate value when there was no public identifier
specified in the source document)

            if (dtdids.indexOf(publicId) != -1) {

Changing the line to:

            if (publicId != null && dtdids.indexOf(publicId) != -1) {

will eliminate the exception
creator: carnold@houston.rr.com
